Waste is the remaining waste from a product or item that is no longer used, but can still be recycled into valuable items.

Organic Waste
Waste that comes from the remains of living creatures which easily decomposes naturally without human intervention to decompose

Inorganic Waste
Waste that is no longer used and is difficult to decompose. Inorganic waste buried in the ground can cause soil pollution because inorganic waste is classified as a substance that is difficult to decompose and the waste will be buried in the soil for a long time, this causes damage to the soil layer.
